posts.post_title: For Sale: large t206 list - HOFers and commons - SGC graded
posts.post_content:
Posted By: rob
For sale all below t206 cards:

First e-mail saying "I want the card" gets it. Takes precedent over request for scans or holding cards.
paypal add 3%

PLEASE - only lots of 3 cards at a minimum for starters, I would like to move larger groups first. Individual cars for sale at a later date.

thanks -  rob
rgutheil@gmail.com

SGC 30 - $28 each unless noted:

brashear
